&#3937;&#3956;&#3928;: [2585] ... 1) ma'i zhe sa/ ... 2) yi dam gyi shes rab mtshon pa'i cha/ ... 3) bud med kyi zhe sa/ ... gsang yum/ ... yum khab tu bzhes pa/ ... 4) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo/ ... yum 'bum pa/ ...

consort, mother, female energy, title of abhidharma literature, the original from which a copy is made
